events.name: Manufacturing Solutions Expo (MSE) 2017 - Day 1
events.description: Manufacturing Solutions Expo (MSE) is an annual one-stop exhibition platform for products and solutions providers to showcase innovative solutions, cost effective technologies and products to improve business productivity and efficiency within and beyond manufacturing industries. The Future of Manufacturing - The High Value Manufacturing Solutions in the ASEAN Region Identify your desired products and technologies at the interactive exhibition booths Enhance your knowledge and understanding of the latest industry innovations and emerging technologies, including: Big Data Analytics | Internet of Things (IOTs) | Manufacturing Execution Systems (MES) | Robotics & System Integration | Pneumatic Automation Technology | Nano Technology | Labelling Systems and Identification | Additive Manufacturing | Clean Rooms | Robots and Handling System | Industrial Plasma | Logistics Management Solutions and many more… Partner Event : http://www.ms-expo.com/ Agenda : http://www.ms-expo.com/programme You must register to attend : http://www.registeratsphere.com.sg/MSE2017/Main/Registration.aspx?t=DEL&o=aHR0cDovL3d3dy5yZWdpc3RlcmF0c3BoZXJlLmNvbS5zZy9NU0UyMDE3L01haW4vV2VsY29tZS5hc3B4&token=NjM2NDQ0NDc3NjA5NDY5ODIw DataTorrent RTS is being actively used in big data & cloud use cases relating to Financial services (Fraud, CyberSecurity), AdTech, IOT, Energy & Utilities, Healthcare, Telco, Retail & E_Commerce etc. To reduce time to market and total cost of ownership, look at operable app factory. You can quickly import and launch micro data services from this factory. Examples: HDFS to HDFS & HDFS-Line-Copy (back-up, replication, disaster-recovery, distcp replacement, continuous big data sync); Kafka  to HDFS (ingest, transform); S3 to HDFS (cloud to on-prem, continuous big data cloud sync); HDFS to Kafka (data lake to event stream, big data log streaming); Database to HDFS (db offload); Database to Database (change data capture, customer 360); Kafka to Database (ingest, transform & load); Kinesis to S3 (Cloud ingest, transform, & load), Data Preparation/Quality, Scale out CEP, Scale out OLAP, Store and replay, Machine scoring, etc. All micro data services include real-time dashboarding of real-time as well as historical metrics. Community Manager of DataTorrent

events.name: Munchee - A decentralized food review incentivized platform
events.description:
About the project:   The Munchee Platform is a Blockchain-based social platform that incentivizes users and restaurants using the Munchee token (MUN). The platform looks to disrupt traditional restaurant review sites such as Yelp, FourSquare, Google Places, and Zagat, by introducing an immutable and verifiable blockchain-based user review process that is based around a crypto-token to incentivize ecosystem participants.  http://www.munchee.io  About the speaker:  Chelsea is a blockchain enthusiast and a foodie at heart. Chelsea holds a Bachelor’s degree with honors in Marketing and Entrepreneurship from San Jose State University. She was previously a marketing consultant at VMware, focusing on supporting vForum live and online events. Before that, Chelsea served as the Program lead for Mid Market Sales - Google's biggest SMB revenue program. Chelsea is a tech – savvy, passionate, trilingual, and culturally enriched professional and entrepreneur. She has been involved with a lot of startups and enterprises both in Asia and the U.S.  Timeline of Event: 18:30 - 19:00 : Registration 19:00 - 20:00 : Keynote 20:00-20:30 : Networking 20:30 onwards : Closing Off   Organizers:    Venue sponsors:   


See you there!
events.location: Paypal Innovation Lab, 5 Temasek Boulevard #07-01, Suntec Tower 5, Singapore, 038985

events.name: Ping Pong Challenge@ DAX
events.description:
Do you and your friends have what it takes to reign as DBS Asia Xs' Ping Pong Champions? Every last wednesday of the month, we open up the floor for a ping pong match. We'll  keep track of the each months top players. If you can hold the spot till the ultimate match in December, you walk away with awesome prizes worth up to $500!
Sign up to play in Singles and Doubles. See you on 25 October 2017, 6:30pm.
events.location: DBS Asia X, Sandcrawler, 1 Fusionopolis View #07-03, Singapore 138577

events.name: talk.js - October
events.description: This is talk.js - a monthly meet up for all things JavaScript, Node.js, and the modern web. Watch past talks on Engineers.sg Agenda 7.00pm: Doors open - mingle with speakers and guests over pizzas 7.20pm: Opening address by host 7.30pm: Start of scheduled talks 8.45pm: Open announcements 9.00pm: End of event Scheduled talks Checkout out this month's scheduled talks at <a>https://github.com/SingaporeJS/talk.js</a> Call for speakers are open Propose your talks at <a>https://github.com/SingaporeJS/talk.js</a> Open announcements It's your turn to speak - make an announcement about a new meet up, job opportunities, upcoming events, or something you've learnt. If you have a short announcement you'd like to share with the audience, you may do so during the open announcements segment. Important Remember to bring a photo ID to get through building security (e.g. driver's license, passport, etc.) Sponsor(s) Venue sponsor: PayPal Food and drink sponsor: PayPal
events.location: PayPal Singapore, Suntec Tower 5, 5 Temasek Boulevard #09-01

events.name: October 2017 Meetup
events.description: Hi everyone! It's time to plan the October meetup. Luckily, Zendesk has kindly invited us to their awesome office, again. They will also sponsor a variety of food and soft drinks. Now we just need to find two speakers! If you  have something cool to share about anything Python related, please reach out to Martin Brochhaus here on meetup.com or via Facebook. Agenda: 7pm: Meet & Greet 7:30pm: NLTK and Friends by Liling Tan The talk will be a basic crash course to Natural Language Processing (NLP). We will try to build a simple application in 30 minutes using NLTK and friends (Scikit-Learn, SpaCy, Gensim and maybe, just maybe PyTorch). Liling is a data geek that works mostly with text processing and machine translation. He contributes to NLTK and seeks help from StackOverflow whenever he works with Pandas dataframe. 8:00pm: Introduction to AWS Lambda with Python by Maximilian Jackson Max is a regular visitor of our monthly user group meetups and has been an active member of the Python User Group and an organizer of PyCon APAC and PyCon Singapore for years. He has recently had the need to figure out how to deploy Python functions to AWS Lambda and would like to share his findings with the community.
events.location: Zendesk @ Haw Par Techno Centre, 401 Commonwealth Drive, #07-01, Singapore

events.name: Becoming a Tech Conference Speaker
events.description: A CFP & speaker workshop inspired by Global Diversity CFP Day Considering giving a talk at JSConf.Asia or any other technical conference, but not sure what to talk about? Or simply can't get started on writing the talk proposal itself? Come join us at the very first RFP & speaker workshop in Singapore, where you will meet conference speakers and speakers to-be. We will mingle, talk about stage fright, share presentation tricks and our stories on becoming conference speakers. If your heart desires, you will also have a chance to present your proposal and gather feedback from other speakers and conference organizers. Bring an open mind and even the tiniest desire to share, and go home with talk ideas and the possibility of becoming a speaker at JSConf.Asia! Agenda6:30pm: Door open7:00pm: Welcome & Introductions7:15pm: Speaker panel8:00pm: Social break8:15pm: Proposal writing8:45pm: Round table discussion & feedback Register here: https://www.eventnook.com/event/becomingatechconferencespeaker/home
events.location: Collision 8, 1 North Bridge Road, 8th Floor, Singapore

events.name: Azure Machine Learning: Part 2 - Data Pre-Processing & Classification
events.description:
Azure Machine Learning: Part 2 - Data Pre-Processing & Classification   This is Part 2 of planned 4 part series on Azure Machine Learning 

Speaker: Setu currently is the Technology Innovation leader for the Nielsen BUY vertical. He is responsible for driving domain differentiated analytics and devises software solutions to problems of high complexity that involve big data, business intelligence, and data analytics. Currently he and his team are involved in the application of machine learning to eCommerce datasets. Please join our new facebook group for greater interaction with this Speaker and All other MVPs and Community Leaders... https://www.facebook.com/groups/MSTechCommunitiesSG
events.location: Microsoft Singapore, Level 22, Room CF12, One Marina Boulevard, Singapore 018989

events.name: Asian Downstream Summit - Day 2
events.description: The 10th annual Asian Downstream Summit is a two-day, dual stream technical conference and exhibition organised annually by World Refining Association (WRA) as part of the Singapore International Energy Week (SIEW). It is the meeting place for the downstream oil & gas industry and forms part of WRA’s international portfolio of conferences dedicated to the downstream refining and petrochemical industry. Now in its 10th edition, the region’s largest downstream-focused conference and exhibition is designed to help refiners, petrochemical operators and chemicals players understand how digital and process technologies can help them achieve overall operational excellence. Digitalisation helps to improve asset integrity, with predictive maintenance, reduce downtime with real-time analytics, improve process efficiency through automated planning and manufacturing and monitor and control energy consumption.  Each year, we issue a call for papers to refiners, EPCs, catalyst companies, technology licensors, additive providers, automation vendors, software vendors and general equipment suppliers and contractors around the globe. We work closely with our Advisory Board, made up of senior refinery and petrochemical professionals from across the region who are tasked with grading the various technical papers received. Only the highest graded, most timely and original papers presented for the first time in the region are selected to be part of the two-day programme. The programme is also packed with thought provoking keynote addresses, high-level panel discussions and in-depth case studies. Partner Event : http://www.downstream-asia.com/ Agenda : http://www.downstream-asia.com/agendaataglance You must register to attend : http://www.downstream-asia.com/Registrations/Step1/36681 DataTorrent RTS is being actively used in big data & cloud use cases relating to Financial services (Fraud, CyberSecurity), AdTech, IOT, Energy & Utilities, Healthcare, Telco, Retail & E_Commerce etc. To reduce time to market and total cost of ownership, look at operable app factory. You can quickly import and launch micro data services from this factory. Examples: HDFS to HDFS & HDFS-Line-Copy (back-up, replication, disaster-recovery, distcp replacement, continuous big data sync); Kafka  to HDFS (ingest, transform); S3 to HDFS (cloud to on-prem, continuous big data cloud sync); HDFS to Kafka (data lake to event stream, big data log streaming); Database to HDFS (db offload); Database to Database (change data capture, customer 360); Kafka to Database (ingest, transform & load); Kinesis to S3 (Cloud ingest, transform, & load), Data Preparation/Quality, Scale out CEP, Scale out OLAP, Store and replay, Machine scoring, etc. All micro data services include real-time dashboarding of real-time as well as historical metrics. events.name: Building PowerShell GUI with SAPIEN PowerShell Studio
events.description:
Please note this is a Paid Event. Find all the details at and the Registration link at http://psconf.asia. PowerShell Conference Asia 2017 - Workshop day Track 3 In this workshop where we are going to demo how easy is to build a PowerShell GUI Application using SAPIEN's Technologies, PowerShell Studio tool. We are going to cover some of PowerShell Studio features from creating one-liners, scripts, thru functions.  Then, integrating this code in our GUI application and finally creating the MSI file for deployment.  This will be a demo-intensive workshop you don't want to miss! Outline: • Console Script v. GUI Tool • Basic GUI Concepts • GUI Development Workflow • Development Exercise • What more can we do? By Maximo Trinidad  (Florida Aka – Mr. PowerShell) is from Puerto Rico living in Florida, has been working with SAPIEN products since early releases of PrimalScript, through the current suite of SAPIEN products. He has been using, speaking, tweeting and blogging about Windows PowerShell since its initial release in 2006. He's Microsoft MVP in Cloud and Datacenter Management (PowerShell 9rs), SAPIEN Technologies MVP, and IDERA ACE(2017). He speaks in SQLSaturday, and .NET Camp events around the Florida’s State. Currently working with SAPIENS Technologies as their Technical Evangelist for their PowerShell and Scripting Tools line of products. http://twitter.com/MaxTrinidad maxtblog.com 





We rely on sponsorship and the support of the community through ticket sales to make this event happen and appreciate the support. Please register for the mailing list using the link on this page to be added to our community Slack channel, click the Register link to buy your tickets. We look forward to welcoming you to the event! Mailing list: http://powershell.us7.list-manage.com/subscribe?u=a239a41647689f0a8b2a47b65&id=7389fe1711 Tickets: http://ow.ly/9B8w100Kqn2
events.location: Microsoft Office, One Marina Boulevard, Singapore

events.name: Big Data Analytics & Effective CEM Strategy - Day 1
events.description: Big Data Analytics & Effective CEM Strategy in Financial Services World Summit 2017 draws together highly-regarded expert speakers from across the ecosystem of financial services industry and big data analytics solution providers to present to you the latest key trends and development in big data analytics and effective CEM strategy. The highlights of the summit will be Perspectives and Case Studies to be shared by senior professionals from financial services companies on their experience in implementing big data analytics and CEM strategy in their businesses. The agenda of this event encompasses: Data Driven Business TransformationEnhancing Your Customers’ Experience through Big Data AnalyticsData Analytics in the IoT Ecosystem – and Beyond!Accelerating Innovation with Artificial IntelligenceLeveraging Big Data Technologies to Achieve Business GrowthDigitizing Customer Support with Machine LearningRegulatory Risk and Remaining CompliantTurning Data into Actionable Customer Insightsand many more!
